metadata.title: PICES Scientific Report No. 19 (2001) - Commercially Important Crabs, Shrimps and Lobsters of the North Pacific Ocean / edited by Robert S. Otto and Glen S. Jamieson
metadata.description:
This report identifies important North Pacific crustacean stocks, describes historical changes in their abundance, indentifies current research programs on them, and clarifies mechanisms that might account for their observed patterns of abundance.  



   [ LC Call No. GC781 .P535 no.19.  ISBN 0968510094 ]
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To report results of four meetings that were held in Nanaimo, Canada (1996); Nemuro, Japan (1997); Fairbanks, USA (1998); and Qingdao, China (1999).

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None Planned

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: Acknowledgement of source publication required.
